value:
Sigurd and Eldigan have always
acquitted themselves naturally well in
these situations. I...need to work at it.

My wife selected this ensemble for
me. It is...quite different from military
garb. I am unsure how I feel about it.

Nothing to be ashamed of... No one is
without shortcomings. Ah—there you
are! Help me to learn these steps?

Physical challenges rarely intimidate
me, but ballroom dancing has proven
arduous. Ethlyn says I ought to relax.

I've been studying the choreography,
but have yet to master it. Would you
mind being my partner for a while?

I am Quan, Prince of Leonster. I bring
you an invitation to dance from your
friend $Nf.

A performance befitting the heir
to the throne of Leonster.

Whether for battle or the dance floor,
preparedness is essential.
Perhaps I've overexerted myself...

I appreciate this. I will do my utmost
to handle it with grace.

I am Quan, Prince of Leonster.
It would be my honor to join you
for tonight's ball.

Stopping for a breather, are you?
It seems we are of the same mind at
the moment, $Nu.$k$pTo be born a prince means I am
obliged to take part in social events
of this kind, but...I care little for them.$k$pPerhaps you and I could slip off to
the training grounds to spar? I jest,
of course. It would ruin my ensemble.$k$pNo, I am afraid I must remain here
and be princely—for it is princely
to overcome one's weaknesses.$k$pYou never seem to struggle in your
dealings with the Heroes. Perhaps
one day you'll share your secret.
でやっ
決める！
くっ…
Too slow..?
Shall we dance?
How about this?
You move well.
One more song?
A grave misstep...
Haha...
Fight on!
Keep steady.
I am a military man first, not a dancer, so I appreciate your patience.
This festival would best befit my friends Sigurd and Eldigan, I'm sure.
My partner is Ethlyn, and she alone.
Before long, my children must themselves learn to dance...
A festival is a fine thing. I am honored to spend this one with you.
Very well.
A difficult routine.
With poise.
